definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: This is when only one side of the knee has been damaged by osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 這是當只有一方的膝蓋已經損害了骨關節炎。

sentences.english: Generation II USA, Inc. - osteoarthritis bracing.
Objective To investigate the effect of electro-acupuncture on cartilage renovation of knee osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討電針對膝骨關節炎軟骨修復的影響。

sentences.english: Examination of osteoarthritic joints is remarkable for the absence of inflammatory signs.
sentences.chinese: 引入注重的是檢查骨關節炎性關節時無炎症性體徵。

sentences.english: Eventually, the necrotic bone collapses, distorting the overlying articular cartilage and producing secondary osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 骨塌陷，扭曲疊壓關節軟骨從而產生繼發性骨關節炎。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the efficacy of topical non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) in the treatment of osteoarthritis (OA).
sentences.chinese: 目的評價外用非甾體類消炎藥治療骨關節炎的療效。

sentences.english: Knee osteoarthritis models were made by ligating the femoral and inferior gluteal veins.
sentences.chinese: 通過結紮股靜脈及臀下靜脈造成膝骨關節炎模型。

sentences.english: Wearing even higher heels puts individuals at even greater risk of developing knee osteoarthritis later in life.
sentences.chinese: 跟越高的鞋，在晚年得骨關節炎的機率就會越大。

sentences.english: The prevalence of osteoarthritis, and osteophyte for drinkers was higher than no drinking people.
sentences.chinese: 飲酒者骨贅形成及膝骨關節炎患病率較不飲酒者低。

sentences.english: Here is another example of degenerative osteoarthritis in which there is prominent "lipping" of the vertebrae.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎顯著“脣形變”的退行性骨關節炎。

sentences.english: Although psoriatic arthritis involves distal interphalangeal joints, usually active joints are red, warm, and tender.
sentences.chinese: 骨關節炎病人疼痛在活動和負重後加重。

sentences.english: The following is a summary of the recommendations in the AAOS' clinical practice guideline, The Treatment of GlenohumeralJoint Osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 推薦的肩關節骨關節炎臨牀實踐指南概要。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of Celebrex on patients with Knee osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察西樂葆治療膝骨關節炎的療效及安全性。

pinyin: A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 bing4
